pages.title: Overworld Trees
pages.text: By default Dynamic Trees can be found all over the overworld populating the surface in almost every biome.$(br2)Oak trees are large and sturdy while birch trees and tall and thin. Explore the world to find a variety of different species and their unique shapes.

Some of these trees can be home to honey bees, so be careful when lumbering to not disturb these fuzzy workers.$(br2)A nest also has a chance to appear on an oak or birch tree while one is naturally growing, if flowers are nearby.
A bee nest on a birch tree
